about_the_game:
Overcome every hurdle present in The Soul Stone War with this compilation of instructions, hints, and roadmaps. Besides highlighting how every achievement triggers and where, this manual will help guide the way through every romance route, ending, and endeavor in the game.

The Soul Stone War Achievements Guide is a manual covering all the achievements of The Soul Stone War by Morgan Vane, as well as providing detailed instructions on how to unlock romances, gain specific Soul Stones and weapons, and achieve every ending available.

It is time to master The Soul Stone War.

  • Learn how to unlock specific Soul Stone Gems and Weapons.
  • Discover how to access every romance route and avoid pitfalls.
  • Map out every single ending and the prerequisites for each.
  • Unlock every single achievement in the game.
